page.title: 09SKELMORLIE P.S. EVENTS
page.content: Each year the school organises some events.The first event is a Christmas Coffee Morning with stalls selling handwork,baking,plants,books and toys. This raises funds for school use.All the classes have Christmas parties. The next event is the May Fete,held outside,mainly with games although we do have stalls with baking,handwork and plants. June has Sports Day with all sorts of races.Points can be gained for your House Team.The Houses are Kelly(green) Winton(yellow),Montgomerie(blue) and Eglinton(red). The end of June brings prizegiving with certificates for academic work, progress and any special ability shown by a pupil.Prize giving is usually a very happy event as it marks the beginning of the summer holidays.
